Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Large industrial space with flexible leasing options. Available spaces can leased together or separately, spaces include two industrial buildings, an office structure and a large yard. See the flyer for more details.
Up to 8.4 acres available. Yard features compacted gravel and very flexible configurations. See flyer for more!
Large industrial building. Two 14'H 14'W grade doors. Includes multiple offices and mezzanine. See flyer for more!
Large industrial building. Two 12'H x 10"W grade doors. Includes an office and lunchroom. See flyer for more!
Office space that includes a reception area, multiple offices and a lunchroom. See flyer for more!
See the Flyer for more information!
24 foot clear height. 32 x 35 column spacing. Dock loading  1 per bay. 3 Phase  200 Amp / 600 Volt. Natural Gas heating. Excellent Amenities close by. See the Flyer for more information!
